fields.name: Beanie Hat
fields.description: Bootcut jeans in our just-right original fit are comfortable and look great too.  5-pocket style sits below waist straight fit through seat and thigh bootcut leg 18" leg opening cotton washable imported extended sizes and washes available online only

fields.name: Backpack
fields.description: Straight-leg styling and on-the-job comfort make our Audra pants a flattering business decision. flat front zip fly with hook-and-bar closure 2 front and 2 back welt pockets 34 1/2" inseam polyester/rayon/spandex washable imported
